control.enable:
#!/system/bin/sh

if [ $(cat /sys/module/max17048_battery/parameters/battery_shutdown) = Y ]
then
  echo 1
else 
  echo 0
fi
control.title: Battery Shutdown
control.description: Disabling this will remove shutdown by critical low battery level trigger for android system. System will power off by kernel at 3.0V to prevent hardware and filesystem damage. But there is a risk of data loss.
